title: First 2020 Presidential Debate: Special Coverage
description:
BlazeTV hosts Glenn Beck, Stu Burguiere, Pat Gray, Steve Deace, Dave Rubin, and Allie Beth Stuckey react to the first debate between President Trump and former Vice President Joe Biden.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
